pages.title: Thermal Core
pages.text: The heart of all ORSA heating devices. This compact heat cell uses blaze powder and magma cream to generate sustained warmth.$(br2)Required for crafting the Thermal Heater and Geothermal Core. Gather blaze rods from the Nether early â€” you won't want to go there later.$(br2)$(italic)Fun fact: The thermal core was originally designed as a hand warmer for ORSA station crew. Then someone realized it could heat an entire room. ORSA Engineering calls this "scope creep." Everyone else calls it "the only reason you're alive."$()
Surround an iron ingot with blaze powder on three sides, magma cream below. Do not taste the magma cream. Kevin tasted the magma cream.
